Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are rapidly becoming recognized as a new alternative to traditional energy conversion systems because of their high energy efficiency.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: From an ecological perspective, this environmentally friendly technology, which produces clean energy, is likely to be implemented more frequently in the future.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: However, the current SOFC technology still cannot meet the demands of commercial applications due to temperature constraints and high cost.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: To develop a marketable SOFC, suppliers have tended to reduce the operating temperatures by a few hundred degrees.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The overall trend for SOFC materials is to reduce their service temperature of electrolyte.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Meanwhile, it is important that the other components perform at the same temperature.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Currently, the anodes of SOFCs are being studied in depth.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Research has indicated that anodes based on a perovskite structure are a more promising candidate in SOFCs than the traditional system because they possess more favorable electrical properties.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Among the perovskite-type oxides, SrTiO3 is one of the most promising compositions, with studies demonstrating that SrTiO3 exhibits particularly favorable electrical properties in contrast with other perovskite-type oxides.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The main purpose of this article is to describe our study of the effect of rare-earth dopants with a perovskite structure on the electrical behavior of anodes in SOFCs.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Sm2O3-doped SrTiO3 synthesized by a solid-state reaction was coated on substrate by atmospheric plasma spray.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: To compare the effect of the dopant on the electrical conductivity of strontium titanate, different concentrations of Sm2O3 were used.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The samples were then investigated by x-ray diffraction, four-point probe at various temperatures (to determine the electrical conductivity), and a scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The study showed that at room temperature, nondoped samples have a higher electrical resistance than doped samples.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: As the temperature was increased, the electrical conductivity correspondingly increased.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The optimum value of 1.1 S/cm was found at 340A degrees C for samples with 1.5% mol Sm2O3.
Titulo: Effect of Samarium Oxide on the Electrical Conductivity of Plasma-Sprayed SOFC Anodes
